articles.author: Oindrila Mukherjee
articles.title: 'Good Friends at COP28': Modi Meets Italian Counterpart Meloni, She Later Posts Selfie with PM - News18
articles.description: PM Narendra Modi appreciated Italy's support for India's G20 presidency and its joining of the Global Biofuel Alliance and the India-Middle East-Europe Economic Corridor
articles.content: Prime Minister Narendra Modi on Friday met his Italian counterpart Giorgia Meloni and said he looks forward to collaborative efforts between the two countries for a sustainable and prosperous future.… [+1797 chars]

articles.title: Gravitas: China's mysterious pneumonia spreads. US, Europe record cases - WION
